author: kalle
msg: A transaction is always flushed. Supports size(), get(), put(), remove() and containsKey().
1. Updated (default), will revert to any changes made to the hashtable since txn was created.
2. Deadlocking, will throw an exception if changes was made to the same entity since txn was created.
3. Last commit wins, will override any changes made to the entities in the hashtable since txn was created.

author: davsclaus
